articles.title: Reception for Special Envoy of Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Reception for Special Envoy of Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Saturday hosted a reception in honor of the special envoy of the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and his party on a visit to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC, who is the special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC, and his party, Ri Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Attending it were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Congratulations to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Egyptian President
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Sunday sent a message to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on his birthday.
					 The message expressed the belief that Egypt would achieve progress, prosperity and stability under the correct leadership of the president and the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries invariably grow stronger.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Trump's Rubbish against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Trump's Rubbish against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A load of rubbish spouted by the old lunatic Trump during his recent visit to south Korea was a total of all nonsense and paradox so far let out by him against the DPRK, says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary.
					 Noting Trump committed a hideous crime against the Korean people by malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the commentary says:
					
					 He insulted the state and social system of the DPRK and the life of its people. This thrice-cursed crime can never be pardoned.
					
					 Trump had better pay heed to the despicable plight of his country, the dark empire of evils under worldwide criticism, before poking his nose into others' things.
					
					 Not content with letting out all sorts of rubbish against the DPRK, he cried out for the use of power like a crazy gang leader, betraying his true colors as a mastermind of aggression. This is just an open declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 However, this is something ridiculous. Such barking of a mad dog can never stun the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people will never fail to make him pay dearly for his blasphemy.
					
					 The U.S. will have to keenly experience what it considered to be the worst-ever thing and witness what it thought of in nightmare for letting such a depraved and stupid guy occupy the Oval Office.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Are Chiefly to Blame for Escalating Tensions: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Are Chiefly to Blame for Escalating Tensions: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet puppet warmongers recently staged the hugest-ever combined naval drills in the East Sea of Korea in league with nuclear aircraft strike groups of the U.S. imperialists. 
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 The combined naval drills committed by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are a military provocation in the wake of Trump's junket to south Korea. This clearly showed the world who is chiefly to blame for the escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now the situation on the peninsula has reached the brink of war and the danger of nuclear war is lingering there. This is just because of the U.S. anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves for provoking a war against it.
					
					 The U.S. is just the mastermind of aggression and war and wrecker of peace and arch criminal who deliberately ratchet up tensions on the peninsula. However, the puppet regime kowtows to it and resorts to tightening military nexus with it. This situation goes to clearly prove that the puppet regime remains unchanged in its wild ambition for igniting a war against the north.
					
					 Durable peace and stability can settle on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the region only when the U.S. military and hostile acts and anachronistic policy toward DPRK are terminated.
					
					 The actual power capable of frustrating the U.S. wild ambition for igniting a war against the DPRK lies in the military muscle strong enough to wipe out any aggressors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Commentator Reveals Purpose of Trump's Junket to Asia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Commentator Reveals Purpose of Trump's Junket to Asia
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries a commentator's article disclosing the purpose of Trump's recent tour of Asia.
					 Noting that Trump's tour of Asia was the reckless one to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as it was aimed at "denuclearization of the north", the article goes on:
					
					 The main target of Trump's first trip to Asia after taking office was explicitly the DPRK.
					
					 He vociferously told everyone he met about the "nuclear threat from north Korea" and forced everyone to make "all efforts" to impose sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 He persistently let Asian countries join in the cooperation for "north's dismantlement of nukes" with threats and allurement, and bragged that he united the world for "maximum pressure on the north."  However, it revealed the poor position of the U.S. which has to recognize the tremendous might of the DPRK and is impossible to cope with the DPRK.
					
					 Trump's Asia trip was also to meet the interests of the U.S.
					
					 Now the U.S. debt has reached nearly 20 trillion US dollars and it is, in fact, enough to declare the state bankruptcy hundreds of times. This is little short of the rope tightening the neck of the United States of America.
					
					 That is why Trump, like a hungry wolf, lined his pocket at random going round Asian countries and even showed mendicant bag, not caring about his face.
					
					 Trump's Asia trip was a cunning one to regain the supremacy of the U.S.
					
					 Another purpose of his Asia trip was to tighten the U.S. supremacy and control over the region and preserve the position of the "only superpower" in decline.
					
					 But the era has changed. Nothing is more serious miscalculation than to think that the U.S. would always block the vigorous advance of mankind for independence, equality, justice and progress.
					
					 Although Trump went to the White House, boasting that he would make the U.S. in decline great again, he makes the U.S. weak and poor, being branded as a lunatic president by the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Regional Body
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was posted by the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria on its website on Nov. 13 with the approach of the sixth anniversary of his demise.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996) deals with the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original one worked out and systematized by its own principles and the revolutionary and popular one truly serving the purpose of the popular masses' struggle for independence.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the Workers' Party of Korea and thoroughly applying it to the revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia on Nov. 13.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the party, was elected chairwoman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting in commemoration of the sixth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Arabs
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Arabs
Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- An Arab committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 12.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt who doubles as co-chairman of the Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 17 t Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: CC de PTC ofrece banquete en honor de enviado especial chino y su comitiva
articles.content:
CC de PTC ofrece banquete en honor de enviado especial chino y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio ayer una recepcion en honor del enviado especial del Secretario General del CC del Partido Comunista de China y su comitiva, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A la comida fueron invitados Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh quien es el enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del CC de PCCh, y su comitiva, el embajador Li Jinjun y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica china en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Por la parte coreana, tomaron parte Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Ri Chang Gun, subjefe de departamento de CC del PTC, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de Abdel Fattah al-Sisi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de Abdel Fattah al-Sisi
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 19 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, con motivo de su cumpleanos.
					En su misiva el remitente expuso la conviccion de que bajo la direccion correcta del destinatario la Republica Arabe de Egipto alcanzara el progreso, la prosperidad y la estabilidad y se desarrollaran invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Minju Jonson condena las difamaciones de Trump contra maxima dignidad de la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Jonson condena las difamaciones de Trump contra maxima dignidad de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Durante su reciente visita al Sur de Corea el vejete Trump hizo peroraciones malas contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Senala asi el comentario individual del periodico Minju Joson difundido este domingo y continua:
					
					El difamo perversamente a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, lo cual deviene un gran crimen imperdonable cometido ante el pueblo coreano.
					
					Ese vejete trato de denigrar el Estado y sistema de la RPDC y difamar la vida del pueblo coreano.
					
					El no debe hablar de otro, sino atender a su pais reconocido por todo el mundo como tierra esteril de los derechos humanos y prestar oidos a la timbre ultima del imperio del mal en agonia.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que ese viejo loco actuo como cabecilla de los gangteres hablando de la fuerza de EE.UU.
					
					El aludido del perro no podra sorprender al pueblo coreano.
					
					Los coreanos haran a Trump pagar mil veces por sus crimenes de haber difamado a nuestra dignidad maxima, nuestro regimen y nuestro pueblo.
					
					Tambien, EE.UU. que dio la presidencia a ese vejete, bribon y tonto, se experimentara de manera escalofriante lo que no desea mas y vera realmente la realidad horrible que imaginaba en la pesadilla.

articles.title: Comentarista de Rodong Sinmun revela el objetivo del viaje de Trump a Asia
articles.content:
Comentarista de Rodong Sinmun revela el objetivo del viaje de Trump a Asia
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto este domingo un articulo del comentarista que revelo el objetivo del viaje de Trump a Asia.
					El articulo revelo con datos el hecho de que la reciente visita de Trump fue la maniobra imprudente para "eliminar las armas nucleares del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					A todas las personas con quienes encontraron el hablo ruidosamente de la "amenaza de las armas nucleares del Norte" y les obligaron hacer "todo lo posible" por la sancion y presion contra la RPDC.
					
					Mediante la amenaza y tentacion, incorporo a los paises asiaticos a la cooperacion por lograr el "abandono nuclear del Norte". Y disparateo que "unio el mundo por la presion maxima contra el Norte. 
					
					Pero, esto muestra que el reconocio el poderio inagotable de la RPDC y revelo por si mismo la situacion pobre de EE.UU. incapaz de enfrentarse solo con la RPDC.
					
					Tambien, esa visita fue para ganar los intereses de EE.UU.
					
					La deuda de EE.UU. de casi 20 billones de dolares sirve de la soga de muerte que aprieta cada dia mas el cuello del imperio norteamericano.
					
					Por eso, durante su viaje Trump actuo locamente para saquear a los paises asiaticos y mendigar el dinero.
					
					Tambien, su visita fue destinada al objeto de rehabilitar la posicion hegemonica de EE.UU.
					
					En este viaje la banda de Trump persiguio tambien el objeto de fortalecer mas el dominio y control de EE.UU. sobre esta region para mantener asi la posicion hegemonica de la "unica superpotencia" en arruinamiento.
					
					Pero, fue cambiada la epoca.
					
					Sera una gran equivocacion si EE.UU. piensa que podria detener para siempre el avance de la humanidad hacia la independencia, la igualdad, la justicia y el progreso.
					
					Trump tomo la presidencia afirmando que "volvera a hacer grande a EE.UU. en plena ruina. Al contrario, el convierte a EE.UU. en el pais mas impotente y pobre.
